trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract class for an expression, which evaluates to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 계산 된 식에 대 한 추상 클래스를 나타냅니다는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A condition is an expression, which evaluates to a `Boolean` value.
Windows Workflow Foundation offers two condition types: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference>.
trans-unit.target: Windows Workflow Foundation은 두 가지 조건 유형 제공: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition>및 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition>

trans-unit.source: You can create a custom condition type by deriving from this class and implementing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition.Evaluate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에서 파생 하 고 구현 하 여 사용자 지정 조건 형식을 만들 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition.Evaluate%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 구현 된 경우의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> resulting from evaluating the underlying expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> 기본 식을 계산 하 여 가져온으로 인해 발생 합니다.
